Landscaping can cost anywhere from $20 an hour for minor work to $350 or more per hour for large and elaborate landscaping jobs.There are some big variables in the cost of landscaping works. According to landscaping professionals, if you’re starting from scratch, expect your landscaping to cost somewhere between 5 and 10 percent of the value of your home. If the landscaping job is not too complex, such as lawns and gardens on a level block, it will be closer to 5 percent.

Average Costs. Nationally, the average price paid to a landscape designer is about $5,200. When deciding on a budget keep in mind that investing in professional landscaping will greatly add to the value of your home. A general rule of thumb is to spend 10% of your home's value on landscaping. So, if you have a $400,000 house then a landscaping budget of $40,000 is appropriate.
